name: Andrélon  Classic Shampoo Verrassend Volume
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Collagen Amino Acids (Collageen), Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Cocamide MEA, Polyquaternium-10, Disodium EDTA, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Mica, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.
